description: Triggers on attacking (when/whenever X attacks / whenever you attack).
Triggers on combat damage dealt to player/creature/planeswalker.
Keyword-style combat modifiers/evasion present in oracle text.
notes: Some entries (hexproof/indestructible) are protection, but also affect combat outcomes; can be split later.

description: Cannot be blocked / unblockable style text.
Forced attack requirements (attacks each combat if able / must attack).
Taxes attacks against you/planeswalkers (Propaganda/Ghostly Prison style).
Combat restrictions (can't attack / can't block / can't attack you / can't attack unless).
Doubles or modifies damage (combat-relevant) such as damage doubling effects.
